name: Dungeon of Youth
description:
An old man getting inside of a dungeon, trying to get what he want. Something that will make him young again. The Potion of Youth

===== HOW TO PLAY ============================================

W = forwards
S = Bacwards
A = Left
D = Right
E = Pick up items(only 1 can be caried)
Left Click = shoot
